title: India Partnering Award: Development and application of lactic acid bacteria as designer probiotics
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: This is an ongoing project that started in Sept 2014 to develop closer links with UK and Indian researchers in the area of probiotics Healthcare Societal
findingsText: The first meeting was held in India in September 2014 and plans for collaboration were agreed. The project will provide knowledge exchange between researchers form UK and India and to develop future more substantial joint funding grants. Creative Economy,Healthcare
